Hello to everyone. Today I was at the historical center campus of Beyazıt in Istanbul University.
@byukusengeabdul make sure this abdul thing is properly handled! The tweet is of an hour ago!
Here I attended the graduation ceremony of the 75th Anniversary of the Faculty of Economics of Istanbul University.
The Faculty of Economics is a great 'school' for me. I made both my license and my doctor here.
At the M1 Amphi where I listened to my lessons from time to time, I came together with my economics and period friends.
Before I talked about the ceremony, I introduced some plaques today in memory of the day when some of them retired. They were very happy.
My school welcomed me in the most beautiful way on this meaningful day. Our Rector, our deceased and unfriendly, have exhibited a sincere host.
İstanbul Economy is a big school, a strong tradition, an effective school that brings great value to my country.
I congratulate once again the 75th year of Istanbul University Faculty of Economics, which I am proud to be a member of.
I wish everyone had a good evening.
